TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A disease in which malignant (cancer) cells are found in the part of the urethra (the tube through which urine leaves the body) that is closest to the outside of the body.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "anterior urethral cancer"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "cáncer de uretra anterior"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Enfermedad en la que se encuentran células malignas (cancerosas) en la parte de la uretra (tubo por donde la orina sale del cuerpo) que está más cerca del exterior del cuerpo.
